title: Tim Seymour: Waiting For The Top Down In Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Tim Seymour returns to discuss cannabis investors getting more sophisticated as the industry grows up. Holding management teams more accountable, multiple quarters of execution, profitability as a relative term. Macro picture is both tremendously promising and frustrating. The importance of access to capital. Deep thoughts on the US landscape; Tilray/MedMen, Trulieve, Gage and more consolidation. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
